resources.string: Please restart the application after giving Root permission
Riru - IFW Enhance has been properly applied
Riru - IFW Enhance has not been properly applied
Your device may not have the Riru-IFW Enhance module installed.\n\nClick DOWNLOAD to go to the Download page.
Go to hell you f*ck app always occupy my sharesheet
Riru - IFW Enhance has not been properly applied. Anything you do may not take effect.
Help to translate RnIntentClean into your language
Analysis logs will not be uploaded

Are you tired of sharing pictures, scouring through long lists of apps just to find LINE, WhatsApp, Telegram and a few other apps you use?

Facebook, Youtube, Twitter........
Why are you guys on my picture sharesheet?
If I needed you, I'd open the app myself to use it, so why take over my share list?

RnIntentClean is an APP that works with the Magisk modules Riru-Core and Riru-IFW Enhance, and you need to give them Root permission for writing IFW rules.
The IFW rules written by this application have been cleared. Please submit again to take effect.
Disable Direct Share in the unmodified Android Sharesheet. This may not take effect.
Enable Direct Share in the unmodified Android Sharesheet. This may not take effect.

If your device supports Google services and already logged in, Android will do an automatic backup, or you can do a manual backup. \n\n Please be aware, however: as versions change, future versions may not support older versions of the data format.
Restore completed. Please restart RnIntentClean manually.
